text: avarkk valla pramāṇavuṁ vannettiyāl avar paṟayuṁ: "daivadūtanmārkk kiṭṭiyatupēāluḷḷat ñaṅṅaḷkkuṁ labhikkunvare ñaṅṅaḷ viśvasikkukayilla.” ennāl allāhuvin nannāyaṟiyāṁ; tanṟe sandēśaṁ eviṭe ēlpikkaṇamenn. adharmaṁ pravarttikkunnavarkk allāhuviṅkal nindyatayāṇuṇṭāvuka. kaṭhinaśikṣayuṁ. avar kāṭṭikkūṭṭiya kutantraṅṅaḷ kāraṇamāṇat
